posts.post_content: This card is great, but in some decks [Green Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Green Sun's Zenith) is much more effective nowadays, depending on what you're tutoring. [Primordial Hydra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primordial Hydra) for example doesn't like the Zenith.
